comment: An alternate way to express existential uniqueness. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-1994.) Replace a nonfreeness hypothesis with a disjoint variable condition on ` ph ` , ` y ` to reduce axiom usage. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 29-May-2019.)
